titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7674

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
3
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteer Militia,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, 186.
List of Comms: to Sec. State Continued

Tho. M. Page " " (Supernumerary; Capt; James R. Page's Company -- ) dated August 19, 1862 --
M. J. W. Ambrose Chaplain -- date Aug. 17, 1862.

Tho. T. Sharp Captain
Charles Fairbanks 1 Lieut
Henry Hughes 2 Lieut } all dated Aug 18, 1862 --
Charles T. Spillman Asst. Surg. date Aug 19. 1862

Wm W. Bradley -- Capt
John E. Burns -- do --
Simeon Crain -- 1 Leiut
Wilkins Warren -- 2 Lieut } all dated Aug 14, 1862,

Leonidas Metcalfe Colo
Wm C. Oden Lt. Colo
J. K. Faulkner Major
W. O. Smith -- do --
Charles Milward -- } all dated Aug. 14. 1862 --

Horace G. Wintersmith " --
Robert L Wintersmith " --
John R. Thomas " -- } all dated aug 15. 1862

Fred: Buckner Lieut: has resigned --
Wm Troxler Lieut: has resigned --
(=date of Comms: Aug 6. 1862=)

Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt. Genl.
